org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api

Class Issue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.Issue

  • public final class Issue
extends Object
    Represents a bugtracking Issue.
    Since:
    1.85

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Issue.Status
      Represents an Issue Status.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EVENT_ISSUE_DATA_CHANGED
      Fired when Issue data have changed.
      static String EVENT_STATUS_CHANGED
      Fired when Issue Status has changed.

      • refresh

        public boolean refresh()
        Refresh the state of this Issue from the remote repository.

        Please note that this method might block for a longer time. Do not execute in AWT.

        Returns:
        true in case the Issue was successfully refreshed, otherwise false
        Since:
        1.85

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Returns the display name of this Issue. Typically this should be the issue id and summary.
        Returns:
        display name
        Since:
        1.85

      • getShortenedDisplayName

        public String getShortenedDisplayName()
        Returns a short variant of the display name. The short variant should be used in cases where the full display name might be too long, such as when used as a title of a tab.
        Returns:
        short variant of the display name
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        getDisplayName()

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens this issue in the IDE.
        Since:
        1.85

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
        Returns the summary of this Issue.
        Returns:
        summary
        Since:
        1.85

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Determines whether this issue is finished/closed.
        Returns:
        true in case this Issue is finished, otherwise false
        Since:
        1.85

      • getStatus

        public Issue.Status getStatus()
        Determines the status of this Issue. Note that a particular bugtracking implementation doesn't have to necessarily handle all status values.
        Returns:
        status
        Since:
        1.85

      • canAttachFiles

        public boolean canAttachFiles()
        Determines whether it is possible to attach files to this Issue.
        Returns:
        true in case it is possible to attach files to this Issue, otherwise false
        Since:
        1.85

      • attachFile

        public void attachFile(File file,
                       String description,
                       boolean isPatch)
        Attaches a file to this issue. The changes are expected to be immediately propagated to the remote repository.

        Please note that this method might block for a longer time. Do not execute in AWT.

        Parameters:
        file - the file to be attached
        description - a description of the attached file
        isPatch - true if the file is a patch.
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        IssueProvider.attachFile(java.lang.Object, java.io.File, java.lang.String, boolean)

      • addComment

        public void addComment(String comment,
                       boolean close)
        Adds a comment to this Issue and closes it eventually. The changes are expected to be immediately propagated to the remote repository.

        Please note that this method might block for a longer time. Do not execute in AWT.

        Parameters:
        comment - the comment
        close - true in case this issue should be closed.
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        IssueProvider.addComment(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, boolean)

      • getRepository

        public Repository getRepository()
        The Repository this Issue comes from.
        Returns:
        repository
        Since:
        1.85
